definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

sentences.english: Straight forequarters is somewhat like a car without springs.
sentences.chinese: 筆直的前驅有些象一輛沒有彈簧減震的汽車。

sentences.english: While driving on the bumpy section of the road, he switches on the shock-absorbers.
sentences.chinese: 在路面不平的路段他開啓了減震器。

sentences.english: On Christmas Eve a new shock isolation design for the E-box is tested.
sentences.chinese: 就在耶誕夜，他們測試了新的E箱減震設計。

sentences.english: Inert gas arc weld the spring strut mount.
sentences.chinese: 惰性氣體電弧焊減震器支座。

sentences.english: Molded EVA midsole delivers maximum shock absorption and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 模壓EVA中底提供最佳的減震性和舒適性。

sentences.english: The effect of sets of cirque costing-energy is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了圓環套數對減震效果的影響。

sentences.english: The roll cage includes the spring strut supports on the rear axle for stability.
sentences.chinese: 防滾翻保護架包括後軸上起穩定作用的減震器支撐。

sentences.english: These results mean significancy in the later research and application of tuned systems.
sentences.chinese: 這些結果對結構調諧減震研究和應用具有一定意義。

sentences.english: Potential uses include next-generation batteries and shock absorbers.
sentences.chinese: 可能的應用領域包括下一代電池和減震器。

sentences.english: Durable, lightweight, aluminum clip-on bars provide optimal vibration damping.
sentences.chinese: 耐用，輕巧，鋁夾條提供最佳的減震。

sentences.english: Flexible exchange rates served as a shock absorber.
sentences.chinese: 靈活的匯率制度可以起到減震器的作用。

sentences.english: Place pre-tensioned coil spring on the vibration damper .
sentences.chinese: 將預拉緊的螺旋彈簧放置在減震器上。

sentences.english: Super strong shock absorbing and elastic anchor.
New cushioned heel design for comfort and enhanced shock absorption.
sentences.chinese: 新氣墊鞋跟的舒適性和增強減震設計。

sentences.english: Humor is the shock absorber of life; it helps us take action .
sentences.chinese: 幽默是生活的減震器，它可以鼓舞人們付諸於行動。

sentences.english: In conclusion, the responses of the bridge with aseismic design much less than that of comparative one.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，減震橋的地震響應遠小於對比橋。

definition: radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
(of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
